attributes.action: legalise electric scooters in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
legalising electric scooters will make a cleaner environment with many using scooters as a mode of transportation it will reduce pollution and ease congestion on the roads. Also it makes for better commuting and gives people
affordable transport who may otherwise not be able to afford transport.
attributes.background: legalise electric scooters in the UK

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/583107
